description.value:
When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its [[lookup @name lowercase]] form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its [[lookup @name lowercase]] form. It is then paralyzed until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

A slain [[lookup @name lowercase]] transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious.
